Here's how you know

Official websites use .gov
A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
A lock ( ) or https:// means you've safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

    VHA Shark Tank Competition

    Identifying Employee-developed Innovations

    Our Mission

    Diffusion of Excellence's annual VHA Shark Tank Competition identifies field-developed innovations that promote positive outcomes and improve experiences for Veterans and employees. The competition spotlights dedicated VA employees who are addressing some of the toughest challenges at VA and provides a platform for frontline team members to contribute to our learning health care system.

    Visit Diffusion Marketplace

    Promising Practices

    Learn more about VHA Shark Tank winners.

    Visit Diffusion Marketplace

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Learn more about the process and how to apply to the next VHA Shark Tank Competition.

    Learn More

    VHA Shark Tank Competition Overview

    Contraception on Demand

    Expanding access to contraceptive care for Veterans

    Contraception on Demand trains pharmacy practitioners to conduct patient-centered contraceptive counseling and to effectively prescribe hormonal contraception; improving Veteran experiences with reproductive care at VA and expanding the scope of practice for VA clinical pharmacists.

    More Information

    VMET

    Veterans Mental Evaluation Team

    VMET assists in responding to calls involving local law enforcement interactions with Veterans in crisis. The team, which includes a VA clinician and a VA police officer, conducts outreach efforts to contact "at risk" Veterans who have stopped showing up for their psychiatric care at their VA facility.

    More Information

    White Noise Project

    Facilitating quality rest and access to holistic sleep care

    The White Noise Project distributes simple, effective, and safe white noise machines to hospitals across the country, providing patients with increased sleep and decreased anxiety in the hospital and at home.

    More Information

    We’re here anytime, day or night - 24/7

    If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.

    • Call 1-800-273-8255 and press 1
    • Text to 838255
    • Chat confidentially now
    • Call TTY if you have hearing loss 1-800-799-4889

    Get more resources at VeteransCrisisLine.net.
